xwikidoc.title: Member Home
xwikidoc.comment: Catch-all for CURRIKI-2182 - Members now go to main page when logged in
xwikidoc.content:
$response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL('Main.WebHome')) #titlebar("Contribute Content" "" "" "red") #member_menu( [ ["", "javascript:addFile2();", "add_resource-2.png"], ["", "javascript:addFromTemplate2()", "create_resource-2.png"], ["", "javascript:addCollection2();", "build_collection-2.png"] ]) ## ## the images must be attached to the current page ## ## ## #titlebar("Visit and Bookmark ~~My Curriki~~" "Go to My Curriki" "$context.user" "purple") #itemtitle( "Your Personalized Member Section" "$context.user")

On your member page, you can:

  • Edit your member profile
  • Find your contributions
  • Access or add to your collections
  • Create your blog
  • Share your curriculum with others
[Go to My Curriki>$context.user] ## ## ## ## ## NEW PROGRAMS PROMO ## ## #titlebar( "Curriki Announces Two New Programs" "" "" "purple") #itemtitle( "'Curriki Master Units' Grants Program" "Main.MasterUnits") #paragraph( "Do you want to contribute your ideas to the broader education community? Work with us to distribute your best practices to a national and international audience. This month we announce a new grant program—Curriki Master Units: The Best in Open Source Curriculum." "Main.MasterUnits" "Learn More") #itemtitle( "Become a Reviewer for the Curriki Review System" "Main.ReviewQualifications") #paragraph( "We are soliciting reviewers for the Curriki Review System." "Main.ReviewQualifications" "Learn More" ) ## ## ## FEATURED PARTNERS ## #titlebar( "Featured Partners" "Go to Featured Partners" "Main.FeaturedPartners" "blue") #itemtitle( "Viditalk" "Demo.viditalk") ## #paragraph( "Curriki has partnered with VIDITalk to use the VIDITalk Platform’s VIDI Widget technology in the Currikulum Builder. VIDI Widget makes inserting instructional videos into the system extremely easy." "Demo.viditalk" "Learn More" ) ## ## #itemtitle( "Listen for Life" "Demo.listenforlife") ## #paragraph( "Listen for Life is a global organization created for the preservation and advancement of musical culture by serving the needs of music, musicians and music listeners in every region of the world. Through our variety of outreach, education and media projects, we aim to create an international family of music listeners, in community with those who compose, teach, and perform all of the wonderfully diverse musical styles that can be heard on the planet." "Demo.listenforlife" "Learn More" ) ## ## ## FEATURED RESOURCES ## #titlebar( "Featured Resources" "Go to Featured Resources" "Main.FeaturedContent" "blue") #itemtitle( "Focus on High-Interest Novels" "Main.FeaturedContent") ## #paragraph( "Teach for America teachers share lessons and activities for ~~Holes~~ and ~~Things Fall Apart~~. Use these to supplement your own materials, or as a starting point for your own collection!" "Main.FeaturedContent" "View Featured Resources" ) ## ## ## ## ## GUIDED TOUR PROMO ## ## #titlebar( "Guided Tour" "" "" "purple") #itemtitle( "Take a Tour of Curriki" "javascript:tourpop();") #paragraph( "Get an overview of Curriki's tools for creating, sharing, browsing, and searching our repository of learning resources. This Guided Tour will give you a look at our newest features, and a sneak preview of more tools coming soon to make Curriki even more powerful and easy to use." "javascript:tourpop();" "Take the Tour" ) ## ## ## ## ## NEWS ## #home_news(1 "Curriki News" "Read All News")
